description: {"blocks":[{"key":"33igt","text":"The NEBNext Ultra II FS DNA Library Prep Kit for Illumina contains the enzymes and buffers required to convert a broad range of input amounts of DNA into high quality libraries for next-generation sequencing on the Illumina platform. Thus, samples prepared with a different method prior to library prep may require re-optimization of the number of PCR cycles.
